job_history.work_description: Oversee cash management, manage financial closings, manage general ledger, review and prepare various account reconciliations, prepare standard & custom internal financial reports in excel, prepare bank borrowing base reports, prepare functional & managerial expense analysis, prepare annual surplus earnings analysis, prepare financial budget, renew listed insurance policies annually, direct auction sale, government reporting, annual financial audit, purchasing, finance and accounting, calculate outstanding interest and fees, review 12 standard journal entries, review quarterly tax filings, prepare and file NYS Dept. of Labor Report Wage report, update and maintain financial performance metrics, maintaining & updating 1099 vendors, manage monthly financial closings and adjustments, manage and maintain employee benefits, prepare and process bi-weekly payroll, review and journalize American Express expenses, journalize and upload to accounting system payroll allocation, employee benefit allocation, implement and review accounting process as needed.

Oversight and maintaining of AP/AR vendors, payment, processing orders, invoices, bank wires, and deposits, cash management including wire transfers, record charges, and adjustments, perform monthly bank reconciliation, account reconciliation between the general ledger and subsidiary ledger to ensure the timely and accurate financial statements are generated, prepare supporting documentation and post journal entries to computerized accounting Software, managed domestic and international budgets, including budget modifications and closeouts, identify, and assist in the implementation of, process improvements in order to shorten the monthly close process, processes and maintain organizations payroll using ADP, maintained and processed International payroll, working with in-country payroll vendors, worked independent while communicating and coordinating with other employees and external clients to facilitate workflow that pertains to the financial deliverables of the organization, assist with special projects.
Reconcile and analyze over 75 POS terminals, and audited receipts for compliance of SOX Procedures, exemplary post sale communication with different departments.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience with financial reconciliations, including bank reconciliations, account reconciliations, and general ledger management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience with all aspects of accounting, including financial closings, general ledger management, and financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll processing, including bi-weekly payroll, international payroll, and employee benefits, suggesting expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Managed domestic and international budgets, including budget modifications and closeouts, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Demonstrated leadership skills by overseeing cash management, directing auction sales, and implementing accounting processes, showing a solid level of proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Used extensively for preparing financial reports, budgeting, and financial analysis, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Prepared various financial reports, including financial budget, expense analysis, and surplus earnings analysis, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Accounting Software
skills.explanation: Used various accounting software, including Intacct, Professional Accounting System, and ADP, suggesting strong proficiency.
